div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li: Import all the codes that are contained in Practitioner role
Import all the codes that are contained in Patient relationship type

description.value: Either a practitioner role or a relationship type. Note from UTG import - may have been a temporary entry that subsequently disappeared from the FHIR source; unable to locate. Version set to 0.1.0
